content: try out this crochet mini strawberry hat pattern link to video https //youtu be/ign9ywoe0zk skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -green red and white -yarn needle -scissors final size - the inside of the hat diameter is 5 5 cm
